name: Aura Kingdom
description:
Aura Kingdom is a majestic new MMORPG published by Aeria Games. From the developers of popular fan-favorite MMOs like Eden Eternal and Grand Fantasia, Aura Kingdom uses state-of-the-art graphics and a detailed anime art style to depict a sprawling fantasy world for players to journey through.

Guiding a hero from humble beginnings, players will soon discover a menagerie of loyal companions that will prove to be invaluable in their journey. They will quickly become a players best friend as they make their way through a myriad of environments and take on formidable foes.
